metadata.title: CVE-2021-37971 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Web Browser UI in Google Chrome prior to94.0.4606.54 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of the Omnibox(URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
